Package com.distrimind.bouncycastle.jcajce

Class PBKDF1Key

java.lang.Object
com.distrimind.bouncycastle.jcajce.PBKDF1Key
All Implemented Interfaces:
PBKDFKey, java.io.Serializable, java.security.Key, javax.crypto.SecretKey, javax.security.auth.Destroyable
Direct Known Subclasses:
PBKDF1KeyWithParameters
public class PBKDF1Key
extends java.lang.Object
implements PBKDFKey
A password based key for use with PBKDF1 as defined in PKCS#5.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • PBKDF1Key

      public PBKDF1Key​(char[] password, com.distrimind.bouncycastle.crypto.CharToByteConverter converter)
      Basic constructor for a password based key with generation parameters for PBKDF1.
      Parameters:
      password - password to use.
      converter - the converter to use to turn the char array into octets.
